description: **Tool Overview**: Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) is a web browser developed by Microsoft, incorporating the open-source Chromium project. This browser is regularly updated to address vulnerabilities, including CVE-2024-6989, which is a security vulnerability identified as a use-after-free issue in the loader. **Details**: To leverage the built-in security features and improvements, users are encouraged to update to the latest version of Microsoft Edge. This helps ensure that any potential vulnerabilities are mitigated, and users can browse with enhanced safety. To check for updates: 1. Open Microsoft Edge. 2. Click on the three-dot menu in the upper right corner. 3. Navigate to 'Help and Feedback' -> 'About Microsoft Edge'. 4. Edge will automatically check for updates and install them if available.
